meaningMnemonic: What is your <kanji>main</kanji> <kanji>view</kanji>? Your <vocabulary>subjective view</vocabulary>, of course! This can be your own <vocabulary>subjective opinion</vocabulary>, and also refers to the idea of the <vocabulary>subjective</vocabulary> in general (as opposed to the objective). It can be hard to step back and look at things without your own unique biases and perspectives.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
